tools.name: move_forward
tools.description: Move the drone forward in a straight line by a specified distance in meters once.

parameters.name: distance
parameters.description: The distance to move forward, in meters. The value must be between 0.2 and 5.0.

tools.description: Moves the drone backward in a straight line by a specified distance in meters once.
